General.Name: Wuxi Longsheng Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Longsheng Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of engine exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) systems in China. It offers electric EGR valves; electronic throttles; medium and heavy duty electric EGR valves; cooler EGR valve assembly products; exhaust back pressure valves/brake valves; gasoline engine EGR valves; natural gas EGR valves; electronic control units; and sensors. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Wuxi, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xing  Xu
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
